meanings.definition: The act of assessing the value or worth of something.
meanings.sent1: The appraisement of the old painting was done by an expert to determine its value.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent provided an appraisement of the house before listing it on the market.
meanings.sent3: During the appraisement of the antique vase, the appraiser accidentally knocked it over.
meanings.sent4: Her appraisement of the situation was that it required immediate action.
meanings.sent5: The appraisement of the rare gemstone was meticulous and thorough.

meanings.definition: An estimate or valuation of the worth of something.
meanings.sent1: The insurance company requested an appraisement of the damaged car to determine compensation.
meanings.sent2: The appraisement of the vintage watch revealed it was worth more than expected.
meanings.sent3: The appraisement of the dog's cuteness factor was off the charts.
meanings.sent4: His appraisement of her talent was as high as the sky.
meanings.sent5: The appraisement of the rare stamp collection was a pleasant surprise.
